1370: Everocker moved to Breestraat.B.13 after marriage.
Got married to Amelgeir at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Amelgeir, Iris, at age 23.
1371: Had a son with Amelgeir, Ghoris, at age 24.
1372: Lost son Eggerdus when Eggerdus was 0 years old.
Amelgeir gave birth to their stillborn son Eggerdus in 1372.
1377: Had a son with Amelgeir, Maelkin, at age 30.
1379: Lost daughter Iris when Iris was 10 years old.
1381: Lost his wife Amelgeir while she was giving birth to Hildebolding in 1381.
Became caretaker of Ghoris, Maelkin, Hildebolding at age 35.
1383: Lost son Ghoris when Ghoris was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
